reviews.text:
Great stay. We had a big room, really clean and nicely furnished. The staff was very friendly. The TV comes with a Google cast, ours had a technical issue so the staff upgraded us to a superior room. ❤️
The food in the room service was disappointing however, but there are a lot of very good food options at walking distance.

Stayed here for a conference at Faculty of Law U of Barcelona which is very close to the hotel. The hotel is lovely with fair size rooms, great breakfast, a nice lounge/restaurant and a small roof top pool to cool off in. Staff were simply excellent! They responded quickly to inquiries before arriving and were very helpful while there. Very clean and only about a 35 minute metro ride to city centre. Also lots of shopping and restaurants close to hotel. Definitely recommend!

We  picked this hotel completely by chance. At check in we were met by a young lady named Wendy who was so helpful to us. And today at checkout again she was most helpful to us qith our luggage and our comfort
The other staff that we met were all very polite and helpful also, but I have got to say that Wendy sets a very high standard for them to follow.

Thank you.

The staff and service were phenomenal- wonderfully nice, accommodating (even with my poor Spanish - the staff spoke great English) and overall quiet location. Easy access to the University campus, Camp Nou and the Metro (giving access to all of Barca).  The room was well set up with a surprisingly spacious shower. While a bit chilly, the pool was a great place to wind down on a hot afternoon!
Breakfast was amazing and a perfect start to each day!
Everybody was incredibly welcoming, and kind. Helped us with whatever we needed. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Felt very safe in this hotel.
